citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The written program of veterinary care (PVC) was not available for inspection. A written PVC is required and helps assure
that the animals housed at the facility have adequate veterinary care available. Ensure to work with the Attending
Veterinarian to develop and maintain the written program of veterinary care.
***Correct by August 25, 2025.

A piece of metal that covers a hollow log shelter for rabbits had rusted and rough edges. Rough edges could cause injury
to animals. Ensure that surfaces that animals can touch are free of sharp edges to protect them from possible injury.
***Correct by July 30, 2025.

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
A written environmental enhancement plan wasn't available for inspection. The birds have housing that provides
environmental enrichment and social housing, however a written plan that is approved by the Attending Veterinarian must
be in place to assure that the birds' environment is appropriate for each species. Ensure that a written program of
environmental enhancement is maintained.
***Correct by August 25, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The written program of veterinary care (PVC) was not available for inspection. A written PVC is required and helps assure 
that the animals housed at the facility have adequate veterinary care available. Ensure to work with the Attending 
Veterinarian to develop and maintain the written program of veterinary care.  
***Correct by August 25, 2025. 
3.50 
   
Facilities, general. 
A piece of metal that covers a hollow log shelter for rabbits had rusted and rough edges. Rough edges could cause injury 
to animals. Ensure that surfaces that animals can touch are free of sharp edges to protect them from possible injury.  
***Correct by July 30, 2025. 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
A written environmental enhancement plan wasn't available for inspection. The birds have housing that provides 
environmental enrichment and social housing, however a written plan that is approved by the Attending Veterinarian must 
be in place to assure that the birds' environment is appropriate for each species. Ensure that a written program of 
environmental enhancement is maintained.  
***Correct by August 25, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
